resources.string: Healthcare for pregnancy at one stop.
Immediate medical support, regular consultation and recommendation.
Real-time health monitoring and much more!

Terms and Conditions
1. Acceptance of Terms and Conditions
1.1. Welcome to Maatran (the "App"). By downloading, installing, accessing, or using the App, you agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions. 1.2. If you do not agree with any part of these Terms and Conditions, do not use the App.
2. Description of the App
2.1. The App is designed to collect sensory information from pregnant women through IoT hardware and send this data to a cloud-based server. 2.2. The collected data is processed to make risk inferences related to pregnancy and maternal health.
3. Privacy and Data Collection
3.1. You acknowledge and consent to the collection, transmission, and storage of sensory information, including but not limited to physiological data, from the IoT hardware. 3.2. The collected data may include, but is not limited to, heart rate, blood pressure, temperature, and other relevant health information. 3.3. We take privacy seriously and will handle your data in accordance with our Privacy Policy.
4. Data Usage and Sharing
4.1. We may use the collected data to provide you with health insights and risk assessments related to your pregnancy. 4.2. We may share anonymized and aggregated data with third parties for research and statistical analysis purposes.
5. Security
5.1. We employ reasonable security measures to protect your data. However, no system is completely secure, and we cannot guarantee the absolute security of your data.
6. User Responsibilities
6.1. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your login credentials and for any activities that occur under your account. 6.2. You must promptly notify us of any unauthorized access or use of your account.
7. Termination
7.1. We reserve the right to terminate or suspend your access to the App at our discretion, with or without cause, and with or without notice.
8. Disclaimer
8.1. The App and any health insights or risk assessments provided are not a substitute for professional medical advice. 8.2. Consult with a healthcare provider for personalized medical advice and care.
9. Changes to Terms and Conditions
9.1. We may update these Terms and Conditions from time to time. It is your responsibility to review these terms periodically for changes.
10. Contact Information
10.1. For any questions or concerns regarding these Terms and Conditions or the App, please contact us at [Your Contact Information].
11. Governing Law
11.1. These Terms and Conditions are governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of [Your Jurisdiction].
By using the App, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agreed to these Terms and Conditions. If you do not agree to these terms, do not use the App.
Maatran is a one stop solution to family level health tracking. Check out the panel below for all our features.
